name: 楊哲化
objective:
本課程主要在介紹工程力學中之靜力學。主要內容包括：力系的平衡、摩擦、面積與質量慣性矩、結構分析、虛功法。				

Textbook: Engineering Mechanics: Statics (11th Edition), by R.C. Hibbeler, Prentic Hall
schedule:
1	Semester Beginning Ceremony
2	Force vectors
3	Particle equilibrium
4	Moment 
5	Force system resultants
6	Distributed loading
7	Free body diagram (FBD)
8	Equilibrium of rigid body
9	Midterm Exam.
10	Structure analysis
11	Method of joints, Method of sections
12	Internal force
13	Shear and Moment diagrams
14	Friction
15	Center of gravity and Centroid
16	Moments of Inertia
17	Mass moments of Inertia
18	Virtural work
